Calculate the total mass of the sled and child: 30 kg + 10 kg = 40 kg
Determine the horizontal component of the force exerted by the adult: 100 N * cos(37°) = 64 N
Calculate the frictional force: 64 N * sin(37°) = 36.88 N
Calculate the normal force exerted by the sled on the ground: 40 kg * 10 m/s^2 = 400 N
Calculate the magnitude of the pressure exerted by the sled on the ground: 36.88 N + 400 N = 436.88 N
Convert the pressure to the magnitude of the pressure exerted by the sled on the ground: 436.88 N / 1000 = 0.43688 m^2 N
Calculate the magnitude of the pressure exerted by the sled on the ground: 0.43688 m^2 N * 9.81 m/s^2 = 42.6 N
